name: Vancouver Fish + Golf Packages
description:
One of our favourite things to do is golf 18 holes and spend the other half of the day fishing. Can’t think of a better day. Golf one of the most scenic and challenging golf courses in B.C. at Sand Piper Golf course in Harrison Mills. After the round of golf have a great lunch and a cocktail then jump into one of our waiting jet boats at the golf course dock and spend the afternoon sturgeon and/or salmon fishing on the beautiful Harrison river or Fraser river. You’ll be back to the dock by 7:00 for a wonderful dinner and drinks at the restaurant.

This is an excellent adventure for the avid golfer and angler. Very popular for birthday gifts and/or anniversary gifts. Hint, Hint ladies…. Lots of couples join us each year who are looking to spend a great day together. Awesome accommodations are available at the golf course as well. Cozy cabins and historical themed rooms. You won’t be disappointed with this package.
